title: Create Daily Site Log
description: A site superintendent needs to create the daily log for the day's activities.

tasks.description: Log the weather conditions as 'Sunny, 75°F' and note the presence of 5 electricians, 8 carpenters, and 1 site inspector.
tasks.expected_outcome: The daily log is created with the specified weather and personnel details.

tasks.description: Record that the 'Rough-in electrical, 2nd floor' task was completed and attach a progress photo.
tasks.expected_outcome: The task completion and photo are successfully added to the daily log.
